Contact Us
GETTING HERE
Getting to Eustis Gun Club has never been easier.
Questions?
Name:
Email:
Phone:
Message:
Thank you for your email. Please note that our administrative office hours are from Tuesday to Friday, 9:00 AM to 3:00 PM. During these hours, we process all membership, renewal, and administrative tasks in the order they
are received.
For contact details of the Board of Directors and other staff members, kindly visit the
Board/Staff
page on our website.
If you need to reach an on-duty Range Safety Officer (RSO) during our range
hours, please call
352-408-8869
.
Everything you need to know about becoming a member of Eustis Gun Club can be found on the
Membership page
, including the ability to submit and sign your application online to join! Have your ID and Firearm Safety Certification handy to begin the membership process!
For information on current activities and events, please refer to the
calendar page
.
Thank you, have a great day!
Oops, there was an error sending your message.
Please try again later.
Do you have questions about membership? Call the Membership Specialist Administrator at 352-742-0118 or click below to call.
﻿

========= JS Section =========
Load jQuery
End Load jQuery
Injecting site-wide before scripts
End Injecting site-wide to the head
HEAD RT JS Include
End of HEAD RT JS Include
photoswipe markup
Root element of PhotoSwipe. Must have class pswp.
Background of PhotoSwipe. 
         It's a separate element as animating opacity is faster than rgba().
Slides wrapper with overflow:hidden.
Container that holds slides. 
            PhotoSwipe keeps only 3 of them in the DOM to save memory.
            Don't modify these 3 pswp__item elements, data is added later on.
Default (PhotoSwipeUI_Default) interface on top of sliding area. Can be changed.
Controls are self-explanatory. Order can be changed.
Preloader demo http://codepen.io/dimsemenov/pen/yyBWoR
element will get class pswp__preloader--active when preloader is running
Alias: b3e5ba2b
Share by:
End Script tags

Membership
Scroll This Page in its Etirety for Full Details on How to Join Eustis Gun Club! All New Membership is completed exclusively Online.
Always Accepting New Members: No Membership Cap and No Sponsorship Required! Scroll to the bottom to apply for membership now!
Eustis Gun Club Membership Benefits:
Year-Round Access
: A once-a-year membership fee of
$250.00
(plus a one-time $100.00 new member initiation fee is collected for all new memberships), grants members and their household family access to the club's facilities 363 days a year, ensuring consistent and convenient access to their preferred shooting activities. Eustis Gun Club is open 7 days a week, with extended facility hours on Tuesday-Thursday until 7pm to accommodate all schedules. This fee is pro rated if you join outside our membership month of June.
Family Inclusion
: The membership yearly fee extends to include the primary member, a spouse/partner residing in the same household, and all minor children, promoting a family-friendly atmosphere and facilitating shared experiences within households.
Guests
: Full members may bring up to 4 shooting guests per day for a nominal daily guest fee.
Membership Requirements
Download EGC Full Range Rules
Identity Verification
Provide a State ID, Driver's License, or Passport to verify your identity.
Verification of Safety Course Completion
Provide proof of completion of a firearm safety course, such as a current non expired CCW, Basic Safety Certification with an instructor signature and number
(must be dated within the past 5 years
), Law enforcement ID, Military active duty or retiree ID, Hunter Safety Certificate
(must be dated within the past 5 years
), or a NRA Firearm Safety Certificate with an instructor signature and number.
If you haven't completed a safety course, qualified approved instructors are available to fulfill this requirement (fees apply). Trainer information can be found on our Instructors page.
Site and Safety Orientation
Attend the Eustis Gun Club Site and Safety Orientation with the Chief Range Safety Officer, which is offered by appointment only
after successful completion of the application process, safety verification, and payment
.
Approximately 12 class dates each month are offered for your convenience and is scheduled after completion of all paperwork and payment.
Onsite Safety Verification
Upon finishing the new membership sign up procedure and the successful completion of the site and safety orientation class, new members will enter a probationary period lasting up to 60 days. Probation may conclude in as little as 3 days, though individuals are given up to 60 days to fulfill it.
Site and Safety Class Completion
The FIRST verification signature must be completed by our Site Orientation Instructors, Assistant CRSO, or CRSO.
Upon completion of the site and safety orientation, you will receive your FIRST verification signature, allowing you to begin shooting on the property
Probationary Safety Signatures Required
Probationary members must obtain three EGC Range Safety Officer signatures by shooting on three separate occasions within 60 days.
These signatures attest to the member's knowledge of Club procedures and safe gun handling on the range.
While on probation, members are not permitted to bring guests
Safety Demonstration Requirement
Range safety is our top priority. Each applicant must demonstrate safe firearm handling skills to an EGC Range Safety Officer.
Adherence to all Eustis Gun Club Facility rules and individual range rules is paramount.
The safety verification includes but is not limited to adherence to safe firearm handling rules
I'M READY TO JOIN NOW! CLICK HERE TO BEGIN THE APPLICATION FOR MEMBERSHIP
Membership Specialist Administrator
Our Membership Specialist Administrator assists current and prospective members with applications, renewals, payments, account updates, and general membership inquiries. This role also supports daily operations, ensures accurate recordkeeping, and helps facilitate smooth communication between members and club leadership.
Regular Office Hours:
Tuesday – Thursday, 9:00 AM – 3:00 PM
(Closed on weekends and holidays)
Emails to the Business office are monitored 7 days a week, please remit email questions at any time to:
admin@eustisgunclub.org
﻿
Extended Hours in June:
To accommodate our annual membership renewal period, the Membership Specialist is available for extended hours, including select evenings and weekends, throughout the month of June—making it easier for members who work during the week to renew.
Call about Membership
Contact Membership Business Office
Name:
Email:
Phone:
Message:
Thank you for contacting us.
We will get back to you as soon as possible.
